content: Could you please tell me your name?
can you tell me what the most popular board game in
Joe, one of the most popular board games in Rochester, NY, is Monopoly. Enjoy a fun evening with friends or family playing this classic!
Joe, I'm doing great, thanks for asking! I've got a plan for the day, but like you, I'm expecting some fun detours. Ready to make some unforgettable memories. How about you?
